location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Birch, Company surgeon at Bushire, to James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green

mods.abstract: The contains a list of the sick and injured that are unfit for duty.*Above the letter, at the top of f. 36, is the end of a letter from John Yoakly Botham, in Bushire, dated 17 August 1768. The rest of the letter is not present.
